General.Name: Arabian Pipes Company
General.Description: Arabian Pipes Company engages in the production and sale of steel tubes in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. It is also involved in the trade, marketing, bending, and forming of toothing pipes and inside and outside pipe coating; buying and selling of pipes, fittings, and accessories; and implementation of the extension of pipelines. The company exports its products to the Middle East and Gulf countries. Arabian Pipes Company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: Riyadh Third Industrial City, Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, 11551

2.Name: Mr. Albara Abdullah Saleh Al-Salamah
